scripts.test:Legzo:mobile: cross-env DEVICE=mobile npx cucumber-js features/legzoMOBILE.feature --format json:./cucumber-json/legzo-mobile.json
scripts.test:Legzo:web: cross-env DEVICE=web npx cucumber-js features/legzoWEB.feature --format json:./cucumber-json/legzo-web.json
scripts.test:Legzo:mobile:clean: npm run clean:artifacts && npm run test:Legzo:mobile && npm run generate:report

scripts.test:Legzo:all: npm run test:Legzo:mobile & npm run test:Legzo:web
